title: Summoners' Society - League Community Team!

embed.description: This is the application for the Summoners Society League Community Team aka LCT! The League community team basically keeps the community active, run tournaments and helps build the bridge closer between the community and LoL.

replies.body:
Great chance to get onboard and meet some amazing people. 

Opportunities are awesome! {{champion:17}}
I'm so happy to be a part of such a great team and community.  It's a great chance to gain experience and work with amazing people. ^^{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
